name: Yowamushi Pedal: Ashita e no High Cadence
overview: A bunch of teenage boys form a bike club at their school, and then talk to each other about bicycles and training for bike riding. No, you don't get to actually do bike racing in this game; you just listen to teenage boy drama around a bicycle club. The game play is sometimes you get to pick which bike boy you like best, then you get to continue reading the endless talking.
